casebody.data:
Sherrill et al., Appellees, v. Harroff, Appellee, et al.; Knoedler, Appellant.

[Cite as Sherrill v. Harroff (1999), 85 Ohio St.3d 339.]

(No. 98-2651 Submitted March 9, 1999 Decided April 21, 1999.) D. Barry Dickson, for appellee Ronnie Dean Harroff. A. Robert Steiskal, for appellant.

The discretionary appeal is allowed.

The judgment of the court of appeals is reversed on the authority of Cuyahoga Support Enforcement Agency v. Guthrie (1999), 84 Ohio St.3d 437, 705 N.E.2d 318.

Moyer, C.J., Douglas, Resnick, F.E. Sweeney, Pfeifer, Cook and Lundberg Stratton, JJ., concur.
